short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts your web content in Ebook format that you can read in your focus time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ublicista Chrome Plugin helps focusing on reading online content. 

=== HOW IT WORKS ===
Pin you extension to your toolbar.
Tell Ublicista which page you want to read later -> Click on the Extension Icon
When you are ready to read, convert your material in a ebook
-> Right Click on the Extension Icon and Select 'Ublicista Bookmarks'
-> Create a Ublicista Collection
And send the collection to your Ebook Reader.

Defer reading while browsing, take your time for reading and allow reflection.

=== FEATURES ===
-> curate your bookmarks
-> collection conversion to epub format, compatible with the EBook Readers
-> table of contents inside the epub for easy navigation between articles
-> adapting the content for the Ebook environment with consistent fonts and document structure
-> for Supported publishers
      - cleaning of ads
      - removing Web specific elements
-> Supported Publishers list
      - Correctiv: www.correctiv.org
      - The New York Times:  www.nytimes.com
      - SÃ¼ddeutsche Zeitung: www.sueddeutsche.de
      - Publico: www.publico.es

If you want that we support another publisher go to the support section of the extension and write us a request.
